mapper.select: select * from project_outline where projectconfirmyn='Y' and projectindexyn='Y' and projectdeadlineyn='N'

select p.projectno, p.projectimage, p.projecttitle, (select name from member m where p.email = m.email) name, (select trunc(deadlinedate - sysdate) from project_funding f where p.projectno = f.projectno) deadlineday, s.supportmoney, s.supportpercent from (select * from project_outline where projectconfirmyn='Y' and projectdeadlineyn='N' order by projectdate desc) p join project_summary s on p.projectno = s.projectno where rownum <= 3

select * from (select p.projectno, p.projecttitle, p.projectimage, (select name from member m where p.email = m.email) name, (select trunc(deadlinedate - sysdate) from project_funding f where p.projectno = f.projectno) deadlineday, s.supportmoney, s.supportpercent from (select * from project_outline where projectconfirmyn='Y' and projectdeadlineyn='N' order by projectdate desc) p join project_summary s on p.projectno = s.projectno order by deadlineday) where rownum <= 3
